title: 根本梁天琦信靠陳雲嗰套思想 做咩要互屌？

replies.msg:
維基百科：梁天琦從小在香港接受教育，塑造其價值觀，並對香港有著深厚情感[7]。同時，他還受到法國思想家尚-雅克·盧梭的《社會契約論》和陳雲根的《香港城邦論》的影響[1]。

說好要不割𥱊不篤灰不分化

連梁天琦係獄中都叫大家放下私怨，
陳雲屌泛民咪由佢屌泛民囉，
你地都不滿泛民旗下嘅612基金啦，
關鍵嘅時候做代表，做你又得差過星火，
理性啲思考好唔好，論述岩咪攞去用。

推 到你明白
屌612基金可以
屌泛民不了

即係云伯屌人就得
人哋屌佢就私怨？
仲要十次有8次老屈抺黑？

今日仲屌緊時代革命喎

replies.msg:
Why?
佢2011年提出嘅總綱以下有邊點你係唔認同？

香港自治運動的政策主張如下：
a. 堅持《基本法》的「港人治港，高度自治」的治港宗旨。
b. 爭取行政長官與立法會雙普選。
c. 要求港府制定公共政策時，具備本土意識，以港人利益為重。
d. 制定移民政策，收回內地移民的審批權。
e. 制定符合香港格局的文化政策及教育政策，保護以粵語教中文的一貫做法。
f. 制定長遠的房屋策略，保障香港人的居住權，並將本土人的地產與外來投資者的地產區隔開來。
g. 重整香港的整體性和主體性，食水自主、農產自保及食物安全，重振本港工業，並支持發展新產業。

佢2011年提出嘅總綱以下有邊點你係唔認同？

香港自治運動的政策主張如下：
a. 堅持《基本法》的「港人治港，高度自治」的治港宗旨。
b. 爭取行政長官與立法會雙普選。
c. 要求港府制定公共政策時，具備本土意識，以港人利益為重。
d. 制定移民政策，收回內地移民的審批權。
e. 制定符合香港格局的文化政策及教育政策，保護以粵語教中文的一貫做法。
f. 制定長遠的房屋策略，保障香港人的居住權，並將本土人的地產與外來投資者的地產區隔開來。
g. 重整香港的整體性和主體性，食水自主、農產自保及食物安全，重振本港工業，並支持發展新產業。

A message to President Trump before the G20 summit. Hong Kong shares more common interests and common values with the USA than no other places in the Indo-Pacific Region. Hong Kong shares common interests but absolutely no common values with PRC. More than two million of Hong Kong citizens denounced PRC values when they protested in the streets, making the largest demonstration of humankind in history ever.

In terms of common interests, PRC takes a lion share while USA makes fair deals. The friendship and bonding of Hong Kong and USA are never fairly represented because of the US Democrats used to choose the pan-Democrats of Hong Kong as delegates and the latter develops vested interests with the PRC over two decades of collaboration. If the policy of USA towards Hong Kong is not corrected, USA will lose Hong Kong as USA lost Vietnam in the 1970s, with graver consequences than ever. USA lost Vietnam mainly because they chose the wrong delegates in Saigon.

The surprise attack of the PRC on Hong Kong through revising the extradition ordinance serves to send a warning signal to USA and other members of the international community in Hong Kong. With Warmest Regards,

Dr Wan Chin

Dear Mr. President Trump,

A message to President Trump before the G20 summit. Hong Kong shares more common interests and common values with the USA than no other places in the Indo-Pacific Region. Hong Kong shares common interests but absolutely no common values with PRC. More than two million of Hong Kong citizens denounced PRC values when they protested in the streets, making the largest demonstration of humankind in history ever.

In terms of common interests, PRC takes a lion share while USA makes fair deals. The friendship and bonding of Hong Kong and USA are never fairly represented because of the US Democrats used to choose the pan-Democrats of Hong Kong as delegates and the latter develops vested interests with the PRC over two decades of collaboration. If the policy of USA towards Hong Kong is not corrected, USA will lose Hong Kong as USA lost Vietnam in the 1970s, with graver consequences than ever. USA lost Vietnam mainly because they chose the wrong delegates in Saigon.

The surprise attack of the PRC on Hong Kong through revising the extradition ordinance serves to send a warning signal to USA and other members of the international community in Hong Kong. It is similar to the attack on Pearl Habour in 1941. Counter attack for reassurance of the interests of USA in Hong Kong is needed, not just defending the status quo, which is collapsing.

With Warmest Regards,

Dr Wan Chin

Dear Mr. President Trump,

A message to President Trump before the G20 summit. Hong Kong shares more common interests and common values with the USA than no other places in the Indo-Pacific Region. Hong Kong shares common interests but absolutely no common values with PRC. More than two million of Hong Kong citizens denounced PRC values when they protested in the streets, making the largest demonstration of humankind in history ever.

In terms of common interests, PRC takes a lion share while USA makes fair deals. The friendship and bonding of Hong Kong and USA are never fairly represented because of the US Democrats used to choose the pan-Democrats of Hong Kong as delegates and the latter develops vested interests with the PRC over two decades of collaboration. If the policy of USA towards Hong Kong is not corrected, USA will lose Hong Kong as USA lost Vietnam in the 1970s, with graver consequences than ever. USA lost Vietnam mainly because they chose the wrong delegates in Saigon.

The surprise attack of the PRC on Hong Kong through revising the extradition ordinance serves to send a warning signal to USA and other members of the international community in Hong Kong. It is similar to the attack on Pearl Habour in 1941. Counter attack for reassurance of the interests of USA in Hong Kong is needed, not just defending the status quo, which is collapsing.

With Warmest Regards,

Dr Wan Chin
